text: Carter Pewterschmidt is a character and the main antagonist from the comedy show Family Guy. == Information == He is the rich father of Lois Griffin, who is the wife to the shows main character, Peter Griffin. Pewterschmidt is married to Babs Pewterschmidt and is voiced by the shows creator, Seth MacFarlane. Category:Family Guy characters
title: Carter Pewterschmidt
